website_summaries.verdict: Provides a clear HD signal thanks to its included amplifier, though its 50-mile range claim is not accurate.
pros: Low-profile flat antenna is easy to set up out of the way
Longer cable allows for more range to position antenna
cons: Takes a few tries to find a sweet spot for reception
Sensitive to line of sight interruptions, causing signal loss
Doesn’t pick up signals at 50 miles

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss with the available channels depending on your location
customer_reviews.text: TV Antenna, NewPlus Indoor Amplified HDTV Antenna 50 Mile Range with Detachable Amplifier Signal Booster, USB PowerSupply and 16.5FT High Performance Coax Cable- Upgraded 2017 Version Better Reception - this was simple to install and the pictures come in very clear however I couldn't get CBS, NBC, ABC or FOX, which is why I purchased it. I tried placing it everywhere. Inside the house, on my window I got 13 channels I wouldn't watch much, if ever. When I put it outside I got 3 more channels but it look awful out there and I don't know how it would hold up. Give it a try. You may end up with 50 channels. For $20.00, it's worth it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased with the TV reception with this Antennae - In ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with the TV reception with this Antennae - In all I picked up 8 channels all with very good reception. I did not expect the channel scan to have them up in the 20'3 and 30's. This antennae will come in very useful as we have not had cable or satellite in many years. Some channels were clearly very high quality (HD) and a couple appeared normal definition TV,experienced no pixelating at all - this was mounted on interior wall and I will try on a window next as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary VanSickle

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: We have been able to pick up a lot of channels! Even my main stations (FOX, CBS, NBC). We got better reception when antenna is in the window. Will be ordering more for our other tvs. I've been dying to cut the cable cord!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing Smart about my TV
customer_reviews.text: I have a furniture type TV (I do not get on well with electronics) and setting this up was So Easy! It took less than 5 minutes. For me one of the best things is how long the cord is for the antenna! I have the it running from the back of my TV up the wall across my ceiling and down about 5" so I could stick it right to on my sliding glass door. I'm sure the reception was probably fine closer BUT this product afforded me the option to put it where I wanted to not where I had to. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: It actually overheated and burned.
customer_reviews.text: The unit I had lasted a while, then the module that connects the unit to the power cable actually burned, creating a hole in the unit. It is now dead and the antenna does not work. I do not trust this unit. Luckily I was home when this happened, who knows what would have happened if I weren't at home.
customer_reviews.author: casualsuede

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent. Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I get around 30 channels. .gotta find that right place to put the antenna..takes alot of patience. .i get a few local channels and other channels. .i have Comcast and its hiway robbery. 165.00 a mo for tv and internet..DONT BUY XFINITY COMCAST! !!...just in case they shut me off at least i have some over the air tv
customer_reviews.author: Drewski

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as good as claimed.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than other cheap ones I've tried, but nowhere near 50-mile range. Often pixelates picture. I'm about 20 miles from the signal towers and have the antenna in the window facing the towers, but still gets pixelated if I use my phone or if there is minor storms. Tried in a different window and got absolutely nothing whereas a cheaper antenna at least picked up something. When this works, it's good, but it doesn't work as well as they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend that you do a lot of research
customer_reviews.text: because of my location in a building, I cannot pick up any channels except one.. I am not in a metropolitan area, but it is mountainous. I am missing about 9 channels, all of which broadcast from a mountain due East of me...and I an on the WESTERN end of a 36 unit, 3 story condo complex, with a hill building, politics and Grandma's panties blocking every signal! lol in reality, I made a butterfly digital antenna that cost me nothing.. it actually got a stronger signal for the one channel I could get than this one.... Recommend that you do a lot of research!
customer_reviews.author: 3 Cranes

customer_reviews.title: New?
customer_reviews.text: It appears to work as promised; however; I was under the impression that I was buying a new product but this item was without a doubt a used item. The antenna itself had two adhesive pads that had what appeared to be remnants of wallpaper attached. Also it was packed in what looked like a used ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: carthub

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Know your area.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you understand to keep it away from walls like stucko it works great. Be sure to do your homework for your area and home. I found in my area that CBS cannot come in because you must use a outdoor antenna. Yet all the other big stations come in great. Some towns only have 15-20 stations and other towns can have 60 stations. Research online your local Air Antenna Channels.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: OK Product
customer_reviews.text: Boughtfor $15.19. Can catch many stations far way. Minus one star. The Amplifier Signal Booster does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Vic, Arlington TX

customer_reviews.title: It picks up great reception and was worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I literally just received this yesterday. Opened it up and it took all of about 5 to 6 minutes to install. It wouldn't have taken that long had I not messed something up in the process. I have it on an "occasionally watched" television in an office. It picks up great reception and was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: They don't come in great, so it's pretty much pointless
customer_reviews.text: This is my third antenna I'm trying out. It gets less channels than my previous and the amplifier didn't work. I ran a scan with the amplifier and received zero channels, ran it without and got around 10. They don't come in great, so it's pretty much pointless. I'll be replacing this with another brand. I gave it 2 stars because at least it picked up something, but I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I received this antenna yesterday and hooked it up, I have a smart TV, no cable but had a $10 antenna from Wal-Mart, which I could get local channels with just fine, The NEW PLUS DIGITALHDTV ANTENNA IS NO BETTER THAN THE CHEAP ON FRO. WAL-MART, I MOVED IT AROUND ON A WINDOW, NEXT TO WINDOW, UP HIGH O EXTERIOR WALL, NONE MADE ANY DIFFERENCE.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have pulled in more stations with this antenna than any other I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I suspect it would get better reception than what I was using but I do ...

Don't expect his antennae to pull in all of the stations and that each station is going to be crystal clear. Does what it's supposed to do but I'm not quite sure whether the distance is accurate. Some channels are better than none.

customer_reviews.text: I was pleased that I got it to work. Only drawback is that sometimes there is a broken static picture on some channels.

customer_reviews.title: I receive a pretty strong signal due to my location in relation to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but as I have found with each one of this type of antenna, the signal can be interrupted by aircraft, cars, etc. and it must be moved to receive all channels. I receive a pretty strong signal due to my location in relation to the TV towers. I think I will try an outdoor antenna on my roof next time to see if I can get a more consistent signal.

customer_reviews.title: nice reception good picture no fading in and

customer_reviews.title: Look at another antenna not this one
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start, pulled it out of the box set it up without plugging the signal booster in and got 22 stations. Plugged in the booster and got one more, then all the channels we're pixelated. So unplugged it and went back to no booster rescanned and now I'm up to 27... yea me! My girlfriend says try the booster again. This time we get almost 40 channels and works pretty good the rest of the night. Btw we never moved the antenna. Today turn on the TV and I can't even Fox and most of the what used to be UHF channels. Don't waste your money on this one. Smh #refundorexchangeplease

product_meta.title: TV Antenna, NewPlus Indoor Amplified HDTV Antenna 50 Mile Range with Detachable Amplifier Signal Booster, USB PowerSupply and 16.5FT High Performance Coax Cable- Upgraded 2017 Version Better Reception
product_meta.description:
NewPlus Indoor Amplified TV Antenna 50 Miles

 Enjoy crystal clear HDTV shows,720p,1080i,1080p|ATSC available.Cut the cable and get access to HD programs forever including local news, weather forecast and sitcoms,kids and sports programs,etc.





Specification:

Range:50 miles with amplifier
Connectors:F Male,Voltage:5V
Power supply connector:USB
Before you buy, visit "antennaweb org" or "antennapoint com" check how many broadcast towers surrounding you within 50miles.





If your digital TV antenna is not working as expected, try the following tips:

1, Check to make sure you have correctly connected the digital TV antenna to your HDTV or third-party HD receiver.
2, Re-scan for channels: In the TV's setup menu, set the mode to indoor TV antenna or air. Refer to the TV manual for detailed instructions.
3, Reposition the indoor TV antenna in a different location. It is suggested place it higher on a wall or closer to a window. Sometimes moving a few feet can make a difference.
4, keep the TV antenna away from those big power consumption devices interference, such as air conditioner, refrigerator and microwave oven,etc.
5, This is an amplified HDTV antenna. If a signal cannot be received with the external amplifier, remove the amplifier and try again.





Package:

1) NewPlus indoor HDTV antenna with 16.5ft coax cable
2) USB power adapter with spare cable
3) Amplifier signal booster
4) Spare 3M sticker

Using this model Now and Cut the cable and get access to HD programs forever.
feature_bullets: FREE Live: You will no need pay Cable or Satellite for Television Again! The Super Thin Indoor HDTV Antenna can pull in all of your local news, sitcom, kids and sports programs in full HD.Free HD Channels like ABC, CBS, NBC, PBC, Fox and others in 50 miles rang from Broadcast Tower, from national TV networks to local TV shows, there’s only the one-time purchase of the antenna, then there’s no cost to you after that. Imagine, month-to-month TV viewing without an annoying contract or monthly fee.

50-MILE RANGE -- The Upgraded Version antenna amplifier boosts the TV antenna with better signal and butterfly pattern optimizes reception. Working frequency: VHF 174-240MHz, UHF 470-862MHz. Channel reception may vary depending on what's broadcasting in your area, distance from broadcast towers, terrain and the surroundings. Before you buy, Check what available channels are in your area by using these websites:"antennaweb.org" or "antennapoint.com".
16.5FT LONG COAXIAL CABLE -- Makes indoor TV antenna easier for you to place it in your house to get the best reception, especially for customers whose televisions are quite far away from windows.

SLIM & HIGH PERFORMANCE -- Paper-thin design makes free HDTV antenna easy to lay flat on table, hide it behind the TV, or place it high on window (highly recommended). It'll pull in hundreds of crystal clear digital & HD shows!

WHAT YOU GET -- NewPlus Indoor HDTV Antenna with 16.5ft coax cable, USB power adapter with spare cable,Amplifier Signal Booster,Spare 3M Sticker. Together with 45 Days Money Back, One Year Guarantee and Friendly, Easy-to-reach Support. If you don't satisfied with the channels you get, feel free to contact us.
